entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Antigonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:54 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
